html:
1.20.19  1:20 am   Hi checking in. Wondering if you are doing okay. We don't really know a lot about you.  

     If you need something? How you spend your day?

      I worry about people who live online but I guess we all do.

      I hope you never feel too alone or forced into this life.
1.20.19  12:51 am   Your songs are awesome, but the lyrics seem so random. How do you come up with your ideas for them?
1.20.19  12:30 am   what time is it where you are?
1.20.19  12:23 am   What key is Slow Down written in?
1.19.19  11:59 pm   sometimes when im listening to slow down i feel like the rhythm reminds me of a clock running sound. was this intentional?

1.19.19  11:28 pm   Outside of composing, do you ever just sit down to practice an instrument?

      What instrument do you enjoy playing the most?
1.19.19  11:03 pm   Are you doing any future interviews or podcasts?
1.19.19  10:47 pm   would you ever make a fully live action music video without animation?
1.19.19  10:45 pm   did you ever have singing lessons or are you just naturally gifted with singing abilities?
1.19.19  10:44 pm   Would you ever release your music on vinyl? It would sound great
1.19.19  10:39 pm   Does all cereal come from a box or can you make your own
1.19.19  7:53 pm   MUSIC IS AWESOME!
1.19.19  7:44 pm   would you ever make a tv show, if given the opportunity?
1.19.19  7:41 pm   are the genius workers nice people
1.19.19  7:00 pm   if humans are 70% water, aren't we technically drowning?
1.19.19  6:57 pm   was the line "now i'm going on a podcast to talk about my memories" in long long long journey related to h3 in any way
1.19.19  6:53 pm   Why does imovie suck so bad
1.19.19  6:44 pm   Do you have a schedule as to when your next song may be released?
1.19.19  6:26 pm   How you get some inspiration to write your songs? (Sorry for the bad English. I'm not American/English/[type here a country who speak English])
1.19.19  6:03 pm   I can relate to many of the notes in the notebook section. Are they random thoughts or the fruit of deep meditation?

1.19.19  5:50 pm   wondering if you ever struggled with bitter thoughts like "why are these less talented musicians more successful than me?" i hang around with lots of artsy types and it seems like a common complaint amongst them. Ever had those thoughts and how did you resolve them?
1.19.19  5:25 pm   what is the life of meaning
1.19.19  4:32 pm   where is the aurport terminal
1.19.19  4:31 pm   are you ever going to livestream? maybe do an editing stream so we can see your creative process?
1.19.19  4:29 pm   can you make a song about dust?
1.19.19  3:46 pm   is life cool
1.19.19  3:22 pm   hey bill just wondering if you've ever heard of my country Serbia? small country but we get a bad rep. will mean a lot to me if you've heard of it

1.19.19  3:02 pm   On this website, the videos on the videos page are 1136x640.

      However, on YouTube, they're 1080p. Do you export two different versions? Is the YouTube version just upscaled from the 1136x640 version?

1.19.19  2:49 pm   bill I was supposed to go out with my friends tonight but I'm not going because it's raining and cold and I don't like clubs. How can I know whether this is how I really feel or this is just the deadly sin of sloth taking over me and thus I should push through it?
also do you like clubs?
1.19.19  1:38 pm   Can I work for you?

1.19.19  1:26 pm   i want to give you a lot of money, can i?

sure
1.19.19  1:25 pm   help, ive heated porridge for the wrong amount of time
1.19.19  12:50 pm   I am going through a crisis, how do I stop the crisis help me
1.19.19  12:21 pm   what is one of your greatest desires and/or wishes
1.19.19  10:11 am   What do I if someone killed me
1.19.19  9:09 am    Can you do an internet?

1.19.19  8:46 am   Why is "slip into something more reasonable" so funny?

     Also the part of the Genius interview where you talk about being in a safe bubble while escaping the apocalypse really resonated with me for some reason. Thanks for doing what you do.
1.19.19  7:39 am   Is it possible that you don't have very strong opinions about things?

1.19.19  7:21 am   Does it annoying when people suggest you are taking many drugs ?

      I find it hard to imagine you would have such insane productivity if you were indeed on many drugs
1.19.19  6:41 am   what does the "hiring all positions" sign that is on your wall mean?
1.19.19  4:54 am   Would you ever release a full song based off of the jingles in 'hi, i'm steve'?
1.19.19  2:25 am   surreal are you not
1.19.19  2:21 am   are there any up-and-coming interviews or podcasts you're featuring in?
1.19.19  1:54 am   Where's the evidence

1.19.19  1:18 am   do you often think how others perceive your art?

     or do you mainly consider your own thoughts?

1.19.19  1:13 am   I just spent some time trying to decode the wingdings at the end of Mt. St. Helens only to find out that they're dingbats which I don't think can be decoded because we haven't assigned a meaning to them.  Did you assign a meaning to the dingbats that I don't know about?
1.19.19  1:01 am   When you write songs, do you start with the lyrics or the melody?
1.19.19  12:45 am   have you ever considered making a second channel to showcase behind the scenes content;
1.19.19  12:35 am   What motivates you to live?

1.19.19  12:33 am   in alot of yours songs you seem to mention not being able to go home quite a bit.

      is this because of experiences you've had in your life?
